meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of beryllium aluminate, often yellow or green in color.
meanings.sent1: Chrysoberyls are beautiful gemstones that come in shades of yellow and green.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler displayed a collection of chrysoberyls in the store window.
meanings.sent3: When the chrysoberyls started singing, everyone in the room was amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like chrysoberyls in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The chrysoberyls shimmered like tiny stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Plural form of chrysoberyl, referring to multiple specimens of the mineral.
meanings.sent1: The museum exhibit showcased various chrysoberyls from around the world.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often seek out rare chrysoberyls to add to their collections.
meanings.sent3: The chrysoberyls at the gem show decided to have a race to entertain the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The field of chrysoberyls glistened like a sea of precious stones.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the chrysoberyls seemed to glow with an inner light.
